title: Classic beef pasta bake
ingredients: ['450g pasta', '450g lean minced beef', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1.2kg passata', '350g ready-made gravy', '125ml single cream', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '120g grated mozzarella cheese']
